jfxtras.labs.map.tile

Interface TileProvideable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TilesSourceAccessable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TileRepository

    public interface TileProvideable
extends TilesSourceAccessable
    This interface defines methods to load the tile. The loading algorithm can be influenced with the TileLoadStrategy.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TileLoadStrategy getStrategy() 
      Tile getTile(int tilex, int tiley, int zoom)
      Returns the tile for x, y and zoom.
      void setStrategy(TileLoadStrategy strategy) 

      • Methods inherited from interface jfxtras.labs.map.tile.TilesSourceAccessable

        getTileSource, setTileSource

    • Method Detail

      • getTile

        Tile getTile(int tilex,
           int tiley,
           int zoom)
        Returns the tile for x, y and zoom. It might also return null if the arguments are invalid.
        Parameters:
        tilex - x position of the tile
        tiley - y position of the tile
        zoom - the zoom level
        Returns:
        the Tile or null if arguments are invalid.

      • setStrategy

        void setStrategy(TileLoadStrategy strategy)

      • getStrategy

        TileLoadStrategy getStrategy()
